name: Pootis Jumper
description:
Pootis Jumper is a game similar to Doodle Jump but with the style of tf2 (team fortress 2) and with many new mechanics.

Due to the google ban the following things have been removed:

Achievements, leaderboards, tournaments and a special mode

This game was canceled for the following reason: when it was supposed to be published on google play, they decided to remove it due to lack of original content even after proving that all the images are made by our artists, the game was originally supposed to have the following things: Achievements, leaderboards, tournaments and a special mode
